posts.post_content:
Posted By: neal
Selling what I believe to be one of the toughest pins to find especially in this condition. I know for me it was one of the last few pins to find when I completed my P2 set.

It is in beautiful shape free of foxing,rust,spots,tears,etc,etc,etc.

Asking $99 shipped. Paypal or MO is fine.

Thanks
